item.description:
Our 2nd Meet-Up will be at Victory Road Park in Dorchester. Here's a link to the location: http://www.bostonharb...

I've never been. Perhaps someone who has can give better directions? Thanks!

I scheduled this meet-up for the afternoon because I think Sunday mornings are bad for a lot of people. But let me know and I can always change it.

Thanks,
Meghan

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: 2nd November Meet-Up
